Title: Ashy Slashy
Writer: Suzanne Keilly, Aaron Lam, Sam Raimi (based on characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Michelle Hurd
Plot: Ruby, Kelly and Pablo go to look for Ash and Baal in an abandoned asylum and encounter some crazy characters. They are all players in Baal's attempt to break Ash and find the Necronomicon. But did his plan work?
